attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that the Human Rights Act works in favour of the indigenous population by ejecting those foreigners, usually illegal immigrants, who are a danger to that same indigenous population because they are being encouraged - through the inability of our government to counteract it - to operate outside the common and criminal laws of this land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
